articles.content: August 1994: At age 27, R. Kelly marries 15-year-old R&B singer Aaliyah D. Haughton. The couple weds in a secret ceremony arranged by Kelly at a hotel in Chicago. The marriage is annulled months … [+7358 chars]

articles.title: Transformers: Royal Mail issues stamps to mark global franchise - BBC
articles.description: The set of 13 stamps was commissioned to celebrate Britain's contribution to the global franchise.
articles.content:
By James GregoryBBC News
A set of stamps depicting characters from the Transformers media franchise has been issued by Royal Mail.

articles.title: Jack Black Is Returning To His Best Franchise - Giant Freakin Robot
